name: mean-stack-example
description: Sample CRUD application built with the MEAN stack.

scripts.start: npm run prepare && concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
scripts.build: npm run prepare && concurrently "npm run build:server" "npm run build:client"
scripts.test: npm run prepare && concurrently "npm run test:client" "npm run test:server"
